content: {"locationId": "6490", "organizationId": "5505", "name": "Florence Food Distribution", "address1": "600 North Main Street", "address2": "Heritage Park", "city": "Florence", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "85132", "country": null, "phone": "626-324-8389", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.03763", "longitude": "-111.39074", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "English, Spanish, Translation Services Available", "features": "Safe Space", "aboutUs": "The Florence Food Bank is located at Heritage Park, 600 N. Main St., Florence AZ.  We are open on the last Friday of each month.  On occasion, we may change the day due to holidays.  We post on Facebook at Florence Arizona Lions Club if there are any changes as well as other social media sites.  We also spread the word as people visit us at the monthly food bank.  During the summer months (April through September) we start at 7:00 a.m. and during the winter months (October through March) we start at 8:00 a.m.  Generally, the food bank is open for approximately one and one half hours.  We are a drive through location.  You do not need to get out of your vehicle.  The food will be loaded for you.  If it is going to placed in your trunk, in the bed of a truck or in the back of an SUV, you will need to open these areas so we can place the food in the location of your choice.    You will need to have an application on file as well as show your drivers license.  If you do not have an application on file, you can submit one on site.  Just request one at check in.  We will have them available.  In addition, if you are picking up food for another person, you will need to have a Proxy form on file.  We also have these available.  You will need to bring a copy of the persons drivers license with you to be attached to this form.  If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask any one of the volunteers that are participating in the food distribution.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Florence Food Distribution", "contactPhone": "626-324-8389", "contactEmail": "florenceazfoodbank@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Emergency Food Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 46, "regionName": "United Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "44cc95f0-b2ef-423d-9209-442ae7382fb4.png", "website": "https://www.unitedfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": ["None-None (We are generally open the last Friday of each month except when there are holidays. We will notify the community by social media and by spreading the word.)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
